messages.subject: Seeking beauty
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe along the lines of finding good in everything, or of say something good for each bad thing you say about someone (or those sorts of themes), you could
messages.messageBody:
Maybe along the lines of finding good in everything, or of "say something
good for each bad thing you say about someone" (or those sorts of themes),
you could have photos of traditionally bad or scary things and find something
good to say

rattlesnakes have pretty markings
Hitler had a nice moustache

I don't know. It would be inexpensive, though. And it would make them
think of things in a new way.

Maybe if you had more than one set of the photos you could have competitions
for the BEST good thing, or for the exclusive or creative good thing.

Sandra
